titles: Observations upon a paper intituled, Reasons humbly offered to this honourable House why a Bill pretended to give further powers to the Corporation for setting the poor of the city of London and liberties thereof to work, should not pass into a law.
notes: Docket title: Observations on the Reasons against the Bill for imploying the poor of London.
keywords: Corportation for Setting the Poor of the City of London to Work --  Early works to 1800.
Poor --  England --  London --  Early works to 1800.
